what_you_do: Winning Proof helps non-fiction authors bring their stories and life lessons to life. Personally, I do all the behind-the-scenes tasks like creating back cover copy, writing the Amazon book page, selecting categories and keywords that will rank well on Amazon, uploading manuscripts to KDP and Ingram-Spark, and maintaining momentum of the project.
social_proof: 95% of my clients express interest in doing a second book with me.
signature_programs: Bathroom Prayers – Inspiring Thoughts While You're on the Pot, From Pen to Published, Gizelle's Silly Soggy Day, Gizelle's Whimsical Wintery Day, The Heart Swindler – Reclaim Your Heart and Stop Falling for Liars, Losers, and Lunatics
business_focus: Helping first-time authors self-publish their books
